Text:
Dear Kamal Bhai! I love the DDR releases!!! I have few request to make, please consider them and take out some time to do them.
I request to do following movies in 720x*** (1/3 DVDR) which you normally do for many recent uploads (the size and resolution can increase upon your wish):
1. Sivaji The Boss (Hindi Dubbed)
2. Khuda Kay Liye

Please reseed "Bol (Retail) - DVDRip - XviD - [DDR]" 1.47 GB version!!!

This will be great help and favor! And I am sure there will be many donwloaders for this!!!!
